Room.Name: Riverdell Way
Room.ShortDescription: You are walking along Riverdell Way, east of the Runfun Archery Academy.
Room.LongDescription: The Runfun Outstanding Archery Academy is designed for superior archers to train and perfect their archery skills. Furthermore, the academy provides expert training in making and repairing bows. The fletchery work is difficult to understand and even harder to master, which is why elven bows always costs so much.
